src:
欧冠-半场2乌龙+连追3球! 切尔西4-4九人阿贾克斯

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

【网易体育6日讯】欧冠联赛小组赛第4轮H组的一出场较量，切尔西在斯坦福桥主场迎战阿贾克斯。上半场亚布拉罕和凯帕先后乌龙，切尔西半场1-3落后阿贾克斯。下半场切尔西围攻阿贾克斯，阿斯皮利奎塔、若日尼奥和詹姆斯先后破门，阿贾克斯布林德和费尔特曼连续红牌被罚下。最终这场进球大战切尔西和阿贾克斯4-4平。相比上周末的联赛首发，兰帕德只作出一个调整，左后卫位置阿隆索取代埃莫森先发。中前场依然是后腰位置若日尼奥和科瓦契奇的搭档，威廉和普利希奇各在一边，芒特居中，亚布拉罕一人突前。出场阵容：切尔西（4231）：凯帕/阿斯皮利奎塔、祖马、托莫里、阿隆索（46’詹姆斯）/若日尼奥、科瓦契奇（87’巴舒亚伊）/威廉、芒特（60’奥多伊）普利希奇/亚布拉罕。阿贾克斯（4231）：奥纳纳/马兹拉维、费尔特曼、布林德、塔利亚菲科/范德贝克、利桑德罗-马丁内斯/内雷斯（72’舒尔斯）、齐耶赫（72’阿尔瓦雷斯）、普罗梅斯/塔迪奇。
text:
Champions League - half 2 Oolong + even chase 3 balls! Chelsea 4-4 nine Ajax

07 Nov 2019, 03:00

[Netease Sports 6th News] In the second round of the UEFA Champions League group stage, the H group played a match, Chelsea played against Ajax at Stamford Bridge. In the first half, Abraham and Kepa followed Oolong, Chelsea 1-3 behind Ajax. In the second half, Chelsea besieged Ajax, Aspiri Quetta, Jožinho and James broke, and Ajax Blind and Feltman were sent off consecutive red cards. In the end, the goal was to fight Chelsea and Ajax 4-4. Compared to last weekend's league start, Lampard only made an adjustment, left-back position Alonso replaced Emerson's starter. The middle and frontcourt are still the partner of the midfielder, and the match between Jorge and Kovačic, William and Plišic are on one side, Mount is in the middle, and Abraham is one. Appearance: Chelsea (4231): Kepa / Aspiri Quetta, Zuma, Tomory, Alonso (46' James) / Jorgio, Kovacic (87' Bashuay ) / William, Mount (60 'Odoy) Plišić / Abraham. Ajax (4231): Onana/Mazlawi, Feltman, Blinder, Thaliafico/Vanderbeck, Lisandro Martinez/Neres (72 'Schuls', Chieher (72' Alvarez), Promes/Tadic.
